Bu, onlayn satış üçün nəzərdə tutulmuş v: This is a website designed for online sales. The project uses TypeScript, Framer Motion, component-based architecture, and other modern React technologies.
Bu, müxtəlif mebel məhsullarının onlayn: This is a website that provides online sales of various furniture products. The frontend of the site is built with technologies such as React, TypeScript, Framer Motion and Redux. The backend is developed using Express.js and MongoDB. The site has product filtering, category-based search, user accounts, cart functionality and dynamic animations.
React-da yaratdğım bu saytda json obyekt: In this website I created in React, I have also worked on the json object and brought the data to the page. I have done these functions to search inside the json object, add products to the cart, delete, increase or decrease the number, and see the total price.
AMO Corporate Group üçün hazırladığım ve: The website I developed for AMO Corporate Group is written in React and TypeScript. It is not currently deployed. It is expected.
'Coza Store' adlanan bu E-Commerce veb s: I developed this E-Commerce website called 'Coza Store' using the Fake Store API. I implemented the project with React. I performed authentication and authorization operations with Node JS. You can download it from Github and start the server and watch
